id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-family-maintaining regular family contact on own terms
title: Maintaining regular family contact on own terms
description: Maintaining regular family contact on own terms
content:
Scenario: Maintaining regular family contact on own terms
    Given Jordan's parents want to stay connected
    And Jordan values family relationships
    When Jordan decides how often to communicate with family
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan set communication preferences
    And the interface shows simple options (daily calls, weekly visits, etc.)
    And Jordan's communication preferences are communicated to family
    And the family_elohim helps family honor Jordan's boundaries
    And Jordan experiences autonomy over family connection frequency
    And Jordan's adult status is respected through choice
